text:
Hey there,

We want to expand our 1.5 dev team with a freelance front-end developer to lead our HubSpot CMS projects.

Is this you?
• You have almost OCD-like attention to detail (an extra space or tab bothers you).
• You don't use frameworks like Bootstrap. And vanilla JS. Yeah, baby. That's you.
• But if it's justified to use any framework, you know exactly why it's necessary, and you always consider performance over convenience.
• You're not only familiar with HubSpot CMS. But also the other hubs. At least to some extent
• This is the way, said the Mandalorian. But you also have your way. We don't only want your skills. We want your brains because this is as much a coding gig as it's a thinking gig. 
• Bonus points if you can jump into a project immediately (not a requirement).
• And obviously, you're a self-starter who communicates clearly, and understands what influences user experience and all the technical SEO stuff.
Wanna take on some extra work and do fun stuff with a fun bunch?
Email <mailto:benjamin@inlink.se|benjamin@inlink.se> and write CMS pro in the headline.
